Thank you for registering your contribution!

#end

In order to complete the review of your contribution, please follow this procedure:

  1. Complete this form with at least the following details: contact author(s), contribution type, abstract, and relevant working group,
  2. Contact SAPO to arrange for a reviewer to be assigned and for the category of the review to be selected
  3. If you wish, configure your XWiki notifications to be alerted to changes to this page,
  4. Use the XWiki comments to interact with your reviewer,
  5. Update the status when the presentation is submitted to the conference, accepted, etc.,
  6. Upload your slides (and proceedings if relevant) using the dedicated upload buttons on this page.

#if( "$!services.user.properties.email" == "" )

$services.icon.renderHTML('warning') Your email address is not set in XWiki, please take a moment to set it. $services.icon.renderHTML('warning')

#end
Information for specific fields
$escapetool.xml($services.localization.render("Presentation.Code.PresentationClass_presenters"))
The person (or short list of people) that should be contacted during the reviewing process. There is no need to list all of the authors that have contributed to the work being presented. The list of contributing authors submitted to conference can be longer.
$escapetool.xml($services.localization.render("Presentation.Code.PresentationClass_abstract"))
Please post your abstract as text (or as wiki markup), in English, even if this does not correspond exactly to what you plan to submit (for example, even if perhaps some equations are misformatted). This helps reviewers easily access the abstract text. In addition, you can optionally attach the abstract as a PDF, or other type of file, and link to it from the abstract using the wiki format: "attach:abstract.pdf".
Slides/Poster and Proceedings
Please upload your materials in PDF or office format using the "Choose an attachment" button in the relevant section, or enter a URL to an external site where the materials are hosted.
$escapetool.xml($services.localization.render("Presentation.Code.PresentationClass_description"))
This space can be used for documenting the presentation and or the approval of the slides and/or proceedings.
